item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

earse everything you added, and when you did just search for
“ipban”

and you should see the command to ip ban, then put this above it.

if (command.startsWith("ancient")) { 
            NpcDialogue = 0; 
            NpcDialogueSend = false; 
         //ancients, magic, animation
            RemoveAllWindows(); 
            if (playerAncientMagics == 1) 
            { 
               setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); 
            // magic tab (
            //ancient = 12855); 
            // /normal = 1151 
               playerAncientMagics = 0; 
               sM("You convert to normal magic!"); 
            } 
            else 
            { 
               setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); 
               playerAncientMagics = 1; 
               sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); 
            }
         }

item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

go into ur client.java search for
“createFrame(107)”

then under that ull see

		setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
		setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); // skills tab
		setSidebarInterface(2, 638); // quest tab
		setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); // backpack tab
		setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); // items wearing tab
		setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); // pray tab

under the pray tab add

					if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
						 setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
						 playerAncientMagics = 0;
					}
					if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
						setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
						 playerAncientMagics = 1;
					}
					if (playerAncientMagics == 2) {
						setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
						 playerAncientMagics = 2;
					}

ull also need to add this to ur client.java

			if (objectID == 6552) {
			if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
				setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
				// /normal = 1151
				playerAncientMagics = 0;
				sM("You convert to normal magic!");
			} else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
				setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
				playerAncientMagics = 1;
				sM("You convert to ancient magicks!");
			}
		}
			if (objectID == 410) {
			if (playerAncientMagics == 0 || playerAncientMagics == 2){
			}
			if (playerAncientMagics == 2 || playerAncientMagics == 1) {
				setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
				// /normal = 1151
				playerAncientMagics = 0;
				sM("You convert to normal magic!");
			} else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
				setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
				playerAncientMagics = 2;
				sM("You convert to lunar magicks!");
			}
		}

also public void this somewhere

	  public void switchBooks() {
    interfaceEffect = 2;
    setAnimation(1652);
    sendFrame126("Normal Magic", 2494);
    sendFrame126("", 2495);
    sendFrame126("", 2496);
    sendFrame126("", 2497);
    sendFrame126("Ancient Magic", 2498);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
		sendFrame164(2492);
		flushOutStream();
  }

finally add the command ::ancient that will switch to ancients

if (command.startsWith("ancient")) { 
            NpcDialogue = 0; 
            NpcDialogueSend = false; 
         //ancients, magic, animation
            RemoveAllWindows(); 
            if (playerAncientMagics == 1) 
            { 
               setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); 
            // magic tab (
            //ancient = 12855); 
            // /normal = 1151 
               playerAncientMagics = 0; 
               sM("You convert to normal magic!"); 
            } 
            else 
            { 
               setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); 
               playerAncientMagics = 1; 
               sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); 
            }
         }

item.description:
@wilsonman60 wrote:

[quote=“MladenJ, post:2, topic:303802”]im not sure if you want it for admins only? or everyone. if everyone then just change the player rights.

go into ur client.java, then search for “bank” once you see a code like that below, replace it with this one.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && playerRights > 2 && !isInPitGame()) { openUpBank(); } if (command.startsWith("empty")) { long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (now - lastAction < 60000) { sM("You must wait 60 seconds after an action to ::empty!"); lastAction = now; } else { removeAllItems(); } } [/quote]i FIXED THAT CANT U READ I NEED AINCHINTS WILL GIVE 10% CRDZ
